title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Preview Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.26.24
description:
Head over to Patreon.com/KindaFunny for daily exclusive content!

Are they honoring Kojima? Plus, Star Wars Outlaws Reviews are in!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:

After that, we’re streaming Outlaws on Twitch and YouTube!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
